p: Examples of the (lower alkyl)sulfonyl group moiety of the (lower alkyl)sulfonyl group, the (lower alkyl)sulfonyl(lower alkoxy) group and the (lower alkyl)sulfonyl(lower alkyl)amino group referred to in the present invention include a linear or branched alkylsulfonyl group having 1 to 6 carbon atoms (referred to as (C 1-C 6 alkyl)sulfonyl), for example, methylsulfonyl, ethylsulfonyl, n-propylsulfonyl, isopropylsulfonyl, n-butylsulfonyl, isobutylsulfonyl, t-butylsulfonyl, n-pentylsulfanyl, 2-methylbutylsulfonyl, 2,2-dimethylpropylsulfonyl and the like.
